properties.title: Flowtrail Tsenelle La Chaux
properties.abstract: The easy flow trail of the Verbier bike park is suitable for anybody - children, adults, beginners or avid mountain bikers. The downhill track offers breathtaking views of the Combin massif, Mont Fort and even Mont Blanc in the distance.
properties.highlights:
Length: 1,7 km
Opening hours: July - September
properties.name: Verbier Bikepark
